parameters.name: redirect_uri
parameters.description: The url to which response will be redirected to

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the access request

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: An opaque value which can be used to maintain state between the request and callback

post.summary: Issues a new Access token (optionally identity_token & refresh_token) in exchange of Oauth grant

grant_type.description: Grant type is a credential representing resource owner's authorization which can be used by client to obtain access token.

client_id.description: A 34 character string that uniquely identifies this OAuth App.

client_secret.description: The credential for confidential OAuth App.

code.description: JWT token related to the authorization code grant type.

refresh_token.description: JWT token related to refresh access token.

externalId.description: External unique resource id defined by provisioning client

userName.description: Unique username, MUST be same as primary email address

emails.description: Email address list of the user. Primary email must be defined if there are more than 1 email. Primary email must match the username.

active.description: Indicates whether the user is active

schemas.description: An array of URIs that indicate the schemas supported for this user resource

items.description: An array of URIs that indicate the schemas supported for this user resource

primary.description: Indicates if this email address is the primary one

type.description: The type of email address (e.g., work, home, etc.)

ScimEmailAddress.description: Email address list of the user. Primary email must be defined if there are more than 1 email. Primary email must match the username.

resourceType.description: Indicates the type of the resource

created.description: The date and time when the resource was created in the system

lastModified.description: The date and time when the resource was last modified

version.description: A version identifier for the resource. This can be used to manage resource versioning and concurrency control.

givenName.description: The user's first or given name

familyName.description: The user's last or family name

endpoint.description: HTTP-addressable endpoint relative to the Base URL of the service provider

ownerSid.description: Optional owner sid. If not provided, the owner will be the organization owner.

accountSid.description: Twilio account sid for the new account, creation is asynchronous owner.

date_created.description: The date and time when the account was created in the system

role_sid.description: Twilio Role Sid representing assigned role

scope.description: Twilio Sid representing scope of this assignment

identity.description: Twilio Sid representing identity of this assignment

sid.description: Twilio Role Assignment Sid representing this role assignment

role_sid.description: Twilio Role Sid representing assigned role

scope.description: Twilio Sid representing identity of this assignment

identity.description: Twilio Sid representing scope of this assignment

schemas.description: Schema URIs that define the contents of the error structure

items.description: Schema URIs that define the contents of the error structure

detail.description: A human-readable description of the error

scimType.description: A scimType error code as defined in RFC7644

access_token.description: Token which carries the necessary information to access a Twilio resource directly.

refresh_token.description: Token which carries the information necessary to get a new access token.

id_token.description: Token which carries the information necessary of user profile.
